import { Typography } from "@mui/material"; import React from "react"; function Aboutpage(props) { return (
We are edvi We make teacher & student’s life simpler, more pleasant and more productive.
About edvi Pandemic made online classes a necessity. It became the new way to attend school, coaching classes, tuition, hobby classes- everything. But this transition from offline to online was not an easy one. Our research led us to conclude that although a lot of platforms offered online education to both students & teachers, there were still many problems that left everyone dissatisfied. We wanted to address these problems and create something that could become a spark that’ll ignite a new, more accessible way of teaching & learning.
Our model With our exclusively designed features, we built a one-stop digital platform for an unmatched quality education experience while also acting as the perfect medium to connect students & teachers from all over the country. This model not only makes online education the need of the hour but also the future. Through edvi, we can create a path that can potentially modernise education and make it attainable without any barriers.
); } export default Aboutpage;
